title: Episode 56: Getting Unstuck
description: At one time or another, many of us feel stuck: in the wrong job, the wrong relationship, the wrong city – the wrong life. Psychologists and self-help gurus have all kinds of advice for us when we feel rudderless. This week on Hidden Brain, we explore a new idea, from an unlikely source: Silicon Valley.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
